review: Very easy to activate. Streams videos very well even with a slower DSL connection. Access to Prime music and Pandora is also great.
author: TOM R.

review: Loving it. EZ to install and use.
author: Dr. Marcia Hootman

review: Love my fire stick! Easy to use, and it was already attached to my prime account! May buy another go the other tv's!
author: A.D. Trent

review: its been great! its even better with the Prime subscrition. the stick get pretty warm, hope it doesn't burn out
author: steve salvesen

review: Works great! Was worried about bandwidth, but I do not even notice this on the network.
author: Some Guy

review: Easy setup and easy to use.
author: Miss Dixieland Delight

review: The fire stick has interference when plugged in and attempting to watch TV.
author: Donald P Duplantis
